text: Whenever people ask me, hey I want to start investing but I do not know where to start, this is the book I recommend to them. Girls Don't Invest is a very simple, uncomplicated, step-by-step, walk-you-through-from-start-to-finish guide on investing in the stock market. This book walks you through the key reasons to start investing, common misconceptions, and key steps to take with your personal finances before entering the stock market. And finally, nailing down your investing strategy. This book came in clutch at a time when I felt overwhelmed and intimidated by the stock market and didn't know where to start. So to anyone who's currently in that situation, this might be your key to finally becoming a girl that invests.
